ygData.subject: RE: Forage and Sense heading (was Re: Sonorous Clouding message)
ygData.msgSnippet: Supposedly, in an upcoming patch, the zone you are in will have an impact on what item you can forage.  This was brought up on the EQBrewers list in reference
ygData.messageBody:
Supposedly, in an upcoming patch, the zone you are in will have an impact on
what item you can forage. This was brought up on the EQBrewers list in
reference to morning dew, which is a component of elven wine. Verant has
stated its in the game but no one has been able to find it. Assuming this
is true, you would expect to find morning dew in Greater/Lesser Faydark.
Guess we will have to wait and see what happens.

Galtin of E'ci

> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Forage and Sense heading (was Re: Sonorous
> Clouding message)
>
> From: "Robert Maze" <rmaze@...>
>
> Heh I know what you mean. I have foraged roots on the boat, vegetables
> underwater, water in Ro, and berries in Permafrost. Too bad they didn't
> make that a little more realistic, but we can't complain.
>
> Kurik Nitesong
> Veeshan
